data.name: Subway Simulator Munich
data.detailed_description:
Drive different vehicles on the fictional map! Explore the map by bus, van, truck or helicopter. You can also take orders from the city and work on the construction site. So you can play exactly what you want. With the various expansions, you can even drive these vehicles in your hometown.

Bus: With the bus you can take people from A to B on different lines in the cities.
Transporter: With the transporter you can bring goods from A to B on different routes in the cities.
Truck: With the truck you can bring the goods from A to B on different routes in the cities.
Helicopter: With the helicopter you can transport things and rescue people.
Construction site: You can also work on construction sites with many different vehicles.

You should always remember to manage the vehicles and workers! In the game you will also always find the official licenses.
